overview.goal: Implement telemetry-driven Feature Shape governance across eight evolutionary capabilities.
principles: Deterministic hashing with explicit evolution annotation
Composable telemetry layers (persistence → diffing → budgets → correlation)

sprints.name: Foundations: Persistence + Hash + Demo Baseline
objectives: Persist per-spec telemetry with rolling history (N=10)
Introduce stable shapeHash and evolution annotation flow
Integrate baseline shapes into existing demo artifacts

tasks.desc: Create persistence module writing normalized telemetry records per spec
Implement rolling retention (truncate >10 oldest records)
Define shape normalization (remove volatile timestamps for hashing)
Implement computeShapeHash(feature,event,beats,batonDiffCount,payloadKeys)
Add evolution annotation registry shape-evolutions.json
CLI script to compare new hash vs last persisted, enforce annotation
Instrument 3 existing Business BDD specs for persistence
Generate initial shape history markdown

acceptanceCriteria: Running test suite produces per-spec telemetry directories and index
Unannotated shape change fails shape-diff-check script
History shows beats and duration deltas for at least 3 features

risks.risk: Hash instability due to payload churn

sprints.name: Enforcement + Coverage Coupling
objectives: CI enforcement of annotated shape diffs
Enhance demo with coverage drift indicators

tasks.desc: Integrate shape diff check into CI pipeline
Extract touched lines/functions from Vitest coverage map per correlationId
Generate deterministic coverageId hash
Persist coverage segment artifact
Update persistence to include coverageId
Demo enhancement with coverage drift table

acceptanceCriteria: CI fails on unannotated shape hash change
Each telemetry record now includes coverageId
Demo displays coverage diffs between last 3 runs

risks.risk: Performance overhead capturing coverage per spec

sprints.name: Budgets + Visual Telemetry Map
objectives: Emit degradation anomalies when budgets exceeded
Generate SVG telemetry map with node health coloring

tasks.desc: Create budgets config and parser
Integrate evaluator in emitFeature endFeature path
Emit shape.degradation anomaly on breach
Aggregate telemetry indices for map generation
Render SVG nodes sized by run count, colored by budget status
Attach map to demo index.html with legend

acceptanceCriteria: Budget breach triggers anomaly and node color change
Telemetry map generated locally and via CI artifact
Demo shows governance gaps (features lacking telemetry)

risks.risk: Overly strict default budgets cause noise

sprints.name: Contracts, Domains & Correlated Composite Shapes
objectives: Build composite correlation artifacts across chained features

tasks.desc: Define contract schema + JSON Schema validator
CI enforcement of contract changes with approval registry
Domain mutation API and instrumentation in sample handlers
Correlation chain tracking across feature invocations
Composite shape aggregation and persistence
Finalize demo narrative and visuals

acceptanceCriteria: Contract violations fail CI
Telemetry records include domain counts when mutations occur
Composite shape artifact produced for chained flow
Demo shows progression from single to composite governed shape

risks.mitigation: Start with linear chains, add branching later

metrics.telemetryCoverage: % of Business BDD specs emitting valid shape telemetry
metrics.shapeStability: # of unannotated shape changes caught per sprint

blueprints.description: Persist telemetry records and verify rolling history maintenance.
acceptanceCriteria: Generates run-* telemetry file
Updates index with retention (<=10 entries)
Contains shapeHash field
blueprints.redFailMessage: Persistence not yet implemented: expected telemetry run-* file and index retention.

blueprints.description: Emit telemetry with stable hash and permit annotated evolution.
acceptanceCriteria: shapeHash reproducible for identical runs
Unannotated change triggers planned failure (simulated)
blueprints.redFailMessage: Hash + annotation not implemented: expected stable shapeHash and annotation enforcement.

blueprints.description: Attach coverageId representing touched lines/functions to telemetry.
acceptanceCriteria: coverageId present
coverageId changes only when touched code changes
blueprints.redFailMessage: Coverage coupling not implemented: expected coverageId generation.

blueprints.description: Detect budget breaches and emit degradation anomaly.
acceptanceCriteria: Budget config loaded
Anomaly emitted when beats exceed threshold
blueprints.redFailMessage: Budget evaluator not implemented: expected anomaly emission.

blueprints.description: Validate feature shape against versioned contract artifact.
acceptanceCriteria: Contract file present
Violation detection test simulates mismatch
blueprints.redFailMessage: Contract validation not implemented: expected schema enforcement.

blueprints.description: Aggregate correlated telemetry chain into composite shape signature.
acceptanceCriteria: Composite JSON produced
Aggregated beats equals sum of individual features
blueprints.redFailMessage: Composite correlation not implemented: expected aggregated composite shape.
